challenge.title: Dr. Neal Barnard - Program for Reversing Diabetes E-Reserve
challenge.description: Dr. Neal Barnard's Program For Reversing Diabetes (2007) discusses how Type II Diabetes can sometimes be cured through a dietary intervention of sustained whole-food, plant-based eating.
challenge.instructions: Read Neal Barnard's Program for Reversing Diabetes on E-Reserve at Archive.org (requires an Archive.org account)
